revised_title: Meteorological Observations and Phenomena in Carlisle, Bridgwater, and Ludgvan in 1767
tldr: This article documents meteorological observations made in Carlisle, Bridgwater, and Ludgvan during 1767. It describes the weather patterns, including heavy snowfall, frost, hail, thunderstorms, and their effects on the local environment and animal health. The author also provides details about temperature fluctuations, wind patterns, and barometric pressure readings throughout the year.
